title: Man behind controversial play on Tipu Sultan resigns as chief of Karnataka-run theatre institute
selftext: Addanda C Cariappa quit citing the loss of the Bharatiya Janata Party in state Assembly elections.
comments:
> Initially, Cariappa asserted that he has substantial documents to prove his claims but later admitted that the two characters were fictional

He and Sudipto Sen must be WhatsApp buddies.
